item.title: About
item.description: I am a final year engineering student at Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani (BITS-Pilani) located in the beautiful state of Goa in India. I am pursuing a B.E. (Hons.) in Electronics and Instrumentation Engineering and will be graduating in 2019. Currently, I am completing my undergraduate thesis under the supervision of Dr. Salil Kanhere at the University of New South Wales, Sydney.
